segments.text: Now we arrive at the Cambridge University , it is one of the oldest universities in the world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wish I had studied here . It's more than a university .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In 2009 Cambridge will come to its eight hundredth anniversary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Woo . It has such a long history . I think I should take more photos of the university .
segments.speaker: S2
